item.title: Celcius
item.description: Intro First of all there is one difficult word in there : hearth which designates the floor of the fireplace. To appreciate this poem, I recommend you to look in the vague (outdoors if possible) and do not fix anything at all, just blurry vision, for like 30 seconds. No, not right now, at the end of the intro. Take a deep breath. Now look away and then don’t be distracted by anything.

item.title: Raymarching
item.description: Introduction I always had a keen interest into fractals, I played quite a fair bit with Apophysis. That’s how I created these images: As you can see, there was also transparency. They look very different on a white or on a black background, you can try (for the first two ones) Fractals give me a sentiment of infinite complexity, and complexity looks mesmerizing to me. Especially structured complexity, like see how in the Grand-Julian there is usage of symmetry, and also patterns like these circles waving around the red part?

item.title: My Tiny Dragon
item.description: Text I have a dragon in my room. One may ask “Show me your dragon” but I cannot. Sadly, it is small, very very small. And it is fast, very very fast. One may ask “Then how do you know it exists ?” Well it’s simple. Sometimes I feel like I tripped over something but no cable, no furniture just a perfectly flat floor, as if it just carelessly bumped into me.

item.title: Un essai maladroit de se faire comprendre.
item.description: Bonjour, Merci d’être venue ici. Je voulais donc répondre à ton message : Je vais être cru et peut être méchante mais des fois c’est chiant de parler avec toi. C’est peut être une rayure mais des fois j’ai l’impression que tu cherches la petite bête, que ce qui t’intéresse c’est le débat et pas vraiment l’avis de l’autre; ça me demande de réfléchir, de me concentrer, de chercher mes mots, et certaines fois je ne suis pas prête à ça.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m building a site, and I always encounter the weirdest bugs. Don’t ask me.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Bon ben fallait pas s’attendre à grand chose, hein! premier post, on fait des tests et tout… Ahhh c’est le texte du lien qui va dans cette boiiiite, je me disais aussi.
